title: OKR File Upload
subtitle: Upload CSV or Excel files to import objectives, initiatives, and activities

fileUpload.title: Upload OKR File
fileUpload.description: Upload a CSV or Excel file with your OKR data
fileUpload.dragDrop: Drag and drop your file here or
fileUpload.templateDescription: Use our template to format your data correctly

guidelines.title: Upload Guidelines
guidelines.format: File must be in CSV or Excel format (.xlsx, .xls)
guidelines.columns: Include columns for: Objective, Initiative, Activity, Area, Owner
guidelines.encoding: CSV files must be UTF-8 encoded

fileUpload.excelTemplateNote: Excel template will be available soon. For now, you can use this CSV file with Excel.

importHistory.title: Import History
importHistory.description: View previous file imports and their status

errors.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please upload a CSV or Excel file.
errors.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is 50MB.
errors.uploadFailed: Failed to upload file. Please try again.
errors.processingFailed: Failed to process file. Check the format and try again.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
